name: Social Web Tactics
description:
Social Web Tactics is a digital marketing agency focused on providing businesses and organizations the ability to connect with their audience using the latest and most effective digital technologies and tools. We live in an age where mass messaging rarely works. You need to go – not just where your customers are – but where they are most receptive to you as a company and your message.
At Social Web Tactics, we help your company tap into social media, share its message through targeted campaigns and connect with people to generate more meaningful online engagements and sales.
READ MORE...
